title: Enhancing University-Level Learning Assessment Competencies: Understanding a Qualitative Research-Based Framework

context.prior_knowledge: Secondary education management experience and basic knowledge of assessment tool utilization
context.additional_context: For corporate social field education managers/leaders, developing competencies to apply university-level learning assessment systems in practice. Emphasizes asynchronous collaboration and self-directed learning in BYOD environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more core elements of university-level learning: knowledge integration, critical thinking, and global issue connectivity.
Learners can write reports analyzing learner performance using a qualitative research-based assessment framework.
Learners can propose two or more strategies for transitioning from skill-centered to knowledge-relationship-centered assessment methods.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
